GSD.description:
scsi: mpi3mr: Fix memory leaks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit 5d76a88b8536d75ff5362e232097e85946b8aadf. For more details please see the references link.
